sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Load Of RstrtMgr.DLL By An Uncommon Process
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects the load of RstrtMgr DLL (Restart Manager) by an uncommon process.
This library has been used during ransomware campaigns to kill processes that would prevent file encryption by locking them (e.g. Conti ransomware, Cactus ransomware). It has also recently been seen used by the BiBi wiper for Windows.
It could also be used for anti-analysis purposes by shut downing specific processes.

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Hashes=SHA1=5B67E21C0CB31AFC4145D85983E060E451B48932,MD5=03E948A848EF103477E6BD87E22F7983,SHA256=02E5101433F8875F76B6D4D5722E7D5779243DA095C992CB7C3545A7BE04093F,IMPHASH=D395767DA515D32D2E437DCA7144A416; SignatureStatus=Valid; ImageLoaded=C:\Windows\SysWOW64\RstrtMgr.dll; Description=Restart Manager; OriginalFileName=RstrtMgr.dll; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); EventID=7; Signed=true; Signature=Microsoft Windows; Image=C:\Users\george\Desktop\file.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

attributes.magic: PE32 executable (GUI) Intel 80386, for MS Windows

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: FILE-EXECUTABLE Portable Executable binary file magic detected
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tcp $EXTERNAL_NET $FILE_DATA_PORTS -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"FILE-EXECUTABLE Portable Executable binary file magic detected"; flow:to_client,established; file_data; content:"MZ"; byte_jump:4,58,relative,little; content:"PE|00 00|",within 4,distance -64; metadata:policy max-detect-ips drop; service:ftp-data,http,imap,pop3; classtype:policy-violation; sid:15306; rev:22; )

alert tcp $EXTERNAL_NET $FILE_DATA_PORTS -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"FILE-EXECUTABLE download of executable content"; flow:to_client,established; http_header; content:"application/x-msdos-program",fast_pattern,nocase; pcre:"/^Content-Type\x3a[\x20\x09]+application\/x-msdos-program/ims"; file_data; content:"MZ",within 2; metadata:policy max-detect-ips drop; service:ftp-data,http,imap,pop3; reference:url,www.microsoft.com/smallbusiness/resources/technology/security/practice_safe_computing_and_thwart_online_thugs.mspx; classtype:policy-violation; sid:16313; rev:13; )

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_category: Malware Command and Control Activity Detected
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET MALWARE [SEKOIA.IO] Win32/Stealc C2 Check-in"; flow:established,to_server; http.method; content:"POST"; http.uri; content:".php"; endswith; pcre:"/^\/\w+\.php$/"; http.content_type; content:"multipart/form-data|3b 20|boundary=----"; http.request_body; content:"form-data|3b 20|name=|22|hwid|22|"; fast_pattern; content:"Content-Disposition|3a 20|form-data|3b 20|name=|22|build|22|"; distance:0; reference:url,blog.sekoia.io/stealc-a-copycat-of-vidar-and-raccoon-infostealers-gaining-in-popularity-part-1/; classtype:command-and-control; sid:2044243; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2023_02_20, deployment Perimeter, malware_family Stealc, signature_severity Major, tag Stealer, updated_at 2023_02_20;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET MALWARE Win32/Stealc Submitting System Information to C2"; flow:established,to_server; http.method; content:"POST"; http.uri; content:".php"; endswith; http.request_body; content:"form-data|3b 20|name=|22|token|22|"; content:"form-data|3b 20|name=|22|file|22 0d 0a 0d 0a|"; fast_pattern; distance:0; base64_decode:offset 0,relative; base64_data; content:"|0a|Network|20|Info|3a 0a 09|"; startswith; content:"|0a 09 2d 20|OS|3a|"; content:"|0a 09 2d 20|Keyboards|3a|"; reference:url,blog.sekoia.io/stealc-a-copycat-of-vidar-and-raccoon-infostealers-gaining-in-popularity-part-1/; classtype:command-and-control; sid:2044248; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2023_02_20, deployment Perimeter, malware_family Stealc, signature_severity Major, tag Stealer, updated_at 2023_02_20;)

alert tcp $EXTERNAL_NET $FILE_DATA_PORTS -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"FILE-OTHER heapspray characters detected - binary"; flow:to_client,established; flowbits:isnotset,file.jpeg; file_data; content:"|0C 0C 0C 0C 0C 0C 0C 0C|",fast_pattern,nocase; metadata:policy max-detect-ips drop; service:ftp-data,http,imap,pop3; classtype:attempted-user; sid:23861; rev:11; )

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: FILE-MULTIMEDIA Microsoft Windows Transport Stream Program Map Table Heap overflow attempt
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tcp $EXTERNAL_NET $FILE_DATA_PORTS -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"FILE-MULTIMEDIA Microsoft Windows Transport Stream Program Map Table Heap overflow attempt"; flow:to_client,established; file_data; content:"|47 40 00|"; byte_test:2,>,1001,29,relative,bitmask 0xFFF; metadata:policy max-detect-ips drop; service:ftp-data,http,imap,pop3; reference:cve,2016-0101; reference:url,technet.microsoft.com/en-us/security/bulletin/MS16-027; classtype:attempted-user; sid:38124; rev:4; )

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: POLICY-OTHER HTTP request by IPv4 address attempt
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tcp any any -> any $HTTP_PORTS ( msg:"POLICY-OTHER HTTP request by IPv4 address attempt"; flow:to_server,established; http_header; content:"Host:",fast_pattern,nocase; pcre:"/^Host\x3a\s*(?:(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9]?[0-9])\.){3}(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9]?[0-9])\s*:?\s*\d*\s*$/ims"; service:http; reference:url,www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec15.html; classtype:policy-violation; sid:50447; rev:1; )

alert ip $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"INDICATOR-SHELLCODE x86 NOOP"; content:"|90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90|",fast_pattern,nocase; metadata:policy max-detect-ips drop,ruleset community; classtype:shellcode-detect; sid:648; rev:18; )

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET HUNTING HTTP GET Request for sqlite3.dll - Possible Infostealer Activity
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET HUNTING HTTP GET Request for sqlite3.dll - Possible Infostealer Activity"; flow:established,to_server; http.method; content:"GET"; http.uri; content:"sqlite3.dll"; fast_pattern; xbits:set,ET.infostealer.pattern.1,track ip_src,expire 15; xbits:set,ET.infostealer.pattern.2,track ip_pair,expire 15; flowint: ET.infostealer.dll.download, +, 1; classtype:suspicious-filename-detect; sid:2044301; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2023_02_22, deployment Perimeter, deployment SSLDecrypt, performance_impact Low, confidence Low, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2023_02_22;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert ip [185.130.36.0/22,185.132.8.0/22,185.134.48.0/22,185.137.98.0/24,185.144.180.0/22,185.145.80.0/22,185.147.140.0/22,185.156.72.0/24,185.161.148.0/22,185.165.24.0/22,185.189.73.0/24,185.192.36.0/22,185.193.90.0/24,185.196.8.0/23,185.196.8.0/22,185.196.10.0/24,185.198.69.0/24,185.208.156.0/22,185.212.240.0/22,185.215.113.0/24] any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET DROP Spamhaus DROP Listed Traffic Inbound group 32"; reference:url,www.spamhaus.org/drop/drop.txt; threshold: type limit, track by_src, seconds 3600, count 1; classtype:misc-attack; flowbits:set,ET.Evil; flowbits:set,ET.DROPIP; sid:2400031; rev:4112; metadata:affected_product Any, attack_target Any, deployment Perimeter, tag Dshield, signature_severity Minor, created_at 2010_12_30, updated_at 2024_09_25;)

alert icmp $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any ( msg:"PROTOCOL-ICMP Unusual PING detected"; icode:0; itype:8; fragbits:!M; content:!"ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWABCDEFGHI",depth 32; content:!"0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuv",depth 32; content:!"EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE",depth 36; content:!"WANG2"; content:!"cacti-monitoring-system",depth 65; content:!"SolarWinds",depth 72; metadata:policy max-detect-ips drop,ruleset community; reference:url,krebsonsecurity.com/2014/01/a-closer-look-at-the-target-malware-part-ii/; reference:url,krebsonsecurity.com/2014/01/a-first-look-at-the-target-intrusion-malware/; classtype:successful-recon-limited; sid:29456; rev:3; )

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET INFO Executable Retrieved With Minimal HTTP Headers - Potential Second Stage Download"; flowbits:isset,min.gethttp; flow:established,to_client; file_data; content:"MZ"; within:2; content:"PE|00 00|"; distance:0; classtype:bad-unknown; sid:2016538; rev:3; metadata:created_at 2013_03_06, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2019_07_26;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO Dotted Quad Host DLL Request

alert icmp $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"PROTOCOL-ICMP PING Windows"; itype:8; content:"abcdefghijklmnop",depth 16; metadata:ruleset community; classtype:misc-activity; sid:382; rev:11; )
alert icmp $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"PROTOCOL-ICMP PING"; icode:0; itype:8; metadata:ruleset community; classtype:misc-activity; sid:384; rev:8; )
